downloadDescription: These are test images for developing and evaluating background subtraction for computer vision. There are seven sequences of images, and each sequence comes from a video. One frame from each sequence is an evaluation image. Accompanying this image is a hand-segmented evaluation image that shows which pixels correspond to the foreground and which correspond to the background.

downloadFile.name: MSR-LA-Data-allow modification and distribution-Test Images for Wallflower Paper_1864.docx
